name: Traditional Ceremonial Matcha
description: Now in a NEW bulk size, this 250g sleeve is the answer for high matcha demand! This premium ceremonial grade matcha is made from the finest first-flush leaves. Its verdant green color gives way to a full bodied and complex cup with a delicate sweetness, balanced with mild umami and a velvet-like mouthfeel. 250g sleeve. 1.5g suggested serving size.

name: Barista Chai Tea Latte Mix
description: Barista Chai is our newest addition! Sweeter than our Nice Chai and in a larger bag size. This is a true Masala Chai with Indian and African black teas with a hand-crafted spice blend including cinnamon, cardamom, clove and ginger. Full of flavor, easy to mix, versatile and simple to use. 240 gram sleeve contains 8 servings. 907 gram sleeve contains 30 servings.

name: Ceremonial Matcha Tea Single-Serve Sticks
description: Ceremonial grade matcha in convenient, single-serve to-go packs, perfectly measured for a ceremonial matcha bowl, or small water bottle. It’s everything we love: top-of-the-world tasty, portable, and accessible!

name: Organic Matcha Mint - 15 Naked Tea Sachets
description: Green, green, green! Premium organic matcha (Japanese stone-ground green tea) is blended with whole-leaf organic green tea and organic American peppermint for a healthy, refreshing, and energizing tea trifecta. A hint of mango rounds out the tea for a bright, balanced cup. - Green tea two ways + Mint - Light Caffeine with slow release - Balanced, clean and bright flavors Get Naked! name: Ceremonial Matcha - 1 oz Tin
description: Our ceremonial grade matcha now in a convenient, 1oz tin! It’s everything we love: top-of-the-world tasty, portable, and accessible! Super-premium Japanese ceremonial grade matcha 100% organic & unsweetened Bright green color with a balanced, nuanced flavor. About 18 (1.5g) servings per tin.

name: Barista Matcha Tea Latte Mix
description: This sweetened blend of 100% organic Japanese matcha and cane sugar tastes sweeter than Nice Matcha, but is still half as sweet as most latte blends. name: Chef's Matcha
description: Chef's Matcha Green Cat Culinary Matcha is a single-ingredient unsweetened matcha made for everyday versatility. name: Best-Sellers Tea Case
description: Can't decide between your favorites? New to tea and not sure where start? Try this mixed case of world-wide favorites! Product image may not represent the contents of the Best-Sellers Tea Case. Will contain a mix of green, black and herbal teas, subject to change depending on availability and seasonality.

name: Two Roots Golden Latte Mix
description: New and improved recipe! Make delicious golden lattes with this naturally caffeine-free blend of healthful turmeric, ginger and black pepper. name: Organic Mountain High Chai Tea
description: The foundation of our chai is top-quality, whole leaf black tea. Then we add whole spices like cinnamon, ginger, and cloves for a bold, yet balanced tea.

name: Organic Assam Tea
description: Assam tea is famous for its lush flavor and amber color. Rich brown and golden tipped leaves yield a multi-layered "malty" flavor.

name: Organic Tart Berry Iced Tea
description: Ripe and refreshing, this is the smoothie of berry teas — a colorful mashup of ripe berries blended with hibiscus, rosehip and orange pieces for a juicy, deliciously tart twist. It's like a juice box for tea lovers! (But without the box). Case contains 24 1oz filter bags; each makes 1 gallon of tea. For our Canadian tea fans, please note that all herbal teas are subject to Canadian Duty Fees.

name: Organic Tropical Green Tea
description: This tea has all the taste of a full leaf green tea with the bonus of refreshing tropical flavors. It's excellent hot or iced.

name: Nice Chai Tea Latte Mix
description: Now available in two sizes! Two Leaves and a Bud’s Nice Chai latte mix is the first barista-quality powdered chai that tastes better than liquid concentrates. Not too sweet; not too spicy, this powdered blend for delicious chai tea lattes is just right...and with only 5g of cane sugar/serving! It's also gluten free, vegan and dairy free. 500g Sleeve - 36 Servings 112g Sleeve - 8 Servings 70 mg of caffeine per serving

name: Organic Turmeric Antioxidant Tea
description: The most delicious way to serve yourself a dose of antioxidants and anti-inflammatories is this naturally caffeine-free organic blend of rooibos and potent spices like turmeric, cinnamon, ginger, coriander and more. It's healthy and tasty! For our Canadian tea fans, please note that all herbal teas are subject to Canadian Duty Fees.

name: Organic English Breakfast Tea
description: Bold and malty with a sweet edge, this is a flavorful every-day tea. It’s great with milk but smooth enough to drink without. Our premium whole leaf tea blend harkens back to the good old days when English Breakfast was made in a teapot.

name: Nice Matcha Tea Latte Mix
description: Now available in two sizes! Take a step into a modernized Japanese tradition with this mix of finely ground green tea and just enough sweetness to blend into delicious matcha lattes or smoothies. Find out why it's such a "Nice Matcha." 500g Sleeve - 36 Servings 112g Sleeve - 8 Servings 37.24 mg of caffeine per serving

name: Organic Chamomile Tea
description: Delicious little flowers — that’s our Organic Chamomile tea. A rich apple scent (in Greek, “milo” means apple) with soft honey notes and a lemon edge. Chamomile has been used for centuries to calm the mind and to aid in digestion. It’s naturally sweet, relaxing and the best chamomile tea you’ll ever have. For our Canadian tea fans, please note that all herbal teas are subject to Canadian Duty Fees.

name: Organic Tropical Green Iced Tea
description: Iced green tea doesn't get any more chill than these tea leaves infused with tropical, melon-berry flavors. Japanese-style sencha leaves stand out for their smooth, lightly steamed flavor. That makes this tea the perfect palate for combining with a tropically-flavored twist. Add honey, agave or simple syrup, and serve with a melon ball on a toothpick! You'll wonder how you ever made it through a scorching summer without this tea! Case contains 24 1oz filter bags; each makes 1 gal tea.

name: Organic Tamayokucha Green Tea
description: This incredible green tea has a sweet, light flavor…never bitter. The tea leaves are gently steamed as they dry, for a beautiful green hue you’ll enjoy seeing in your cup and savoring on your tongue.

name: Alpine Berry Tea
description: Alpine Berry herbal tea is naturally sweet and tart with hibiscus, blackberry leaves, and orange peel. It's refreshing hot or iced. For our Canadian tea fans, please note that all herbal teas are subject to Canadian Duty Fees.

name: Organic Black Iced Tea
description: Smooth, but robust, these black organic tea leaves yield a complexity of flavor that will have you smacking your lips after every taste! Not just any iced tea — this select orange pekoe tea from Assam, India, demands to be tasted before you even think about adding sweetener. Note its malty flavor and amber color and then decide if you want to sweeten your glass for a seriously addictive, refreshing glass of tea. Case contains 24 1oz filter bags; each make 1 gallon of tea.

name: Organic Earl Grey Tea
description: Our Earl Grey starts with a great quality, large leaf organic black tea. We add just a hint of natural bergamot to create the famous taste.
